New Records: Virat Kohli scored the 49th ODI century, equaling Sachin Tendulkar's record
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs
Mohammed Siraj conceded 94 runs in 9.4 overs for just one wicket
Quinton de Kock chopped Mohammed Siraj on in the second over of the chase
Temba Bavuma was bowled by Ravindra Jadeja
Jadeja's second five-wicket haul in ODI cricket
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance and the support from the crowd on his birthday
Ravindra Jadeja's performance was highlighted as a key factor in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lungi Ngidi injured in the 35th over
South Africa's bowlers struggled with the old ball, especially against spin
